sys_element_mapping.value:
You have been identified as the supervisor of {{b029bf59-5c7c-4a14-8a55-69dd287b2e83.person_leaving.name}}, an employee who has not accessed APi’s network in over 30 days.

Employee last login date: {{b029bf59-5c7c-4a14-8a55-69dd287b2e83.last_login}}

Network Security and SOX Compliancy regulations require quarterly recertification of employment status for employees who do not access their active network accounts. Last certification for {{b029bf59-5c7c-4a14-8a55-69dd287b2e83.person_leaving.name}} was performed on {{ef042713-a605-4f08-992b-47abd7301d5e.output_last_response}}.

Please certify the employee’s status below. This must be completed by {{fd_transform:da414b82-5281-4d49-987b-1b23cf49c8d5}}.

sys_hub_flow_logic.comment: Is user a reactivated SEC17 term?

sys_hub_flow_logic_ext_input.label: RITM Record
sys_hub_flow_logic_ext_input.name: var__m_sys_hub_flow_logic_ext_input_3e3ee7d01b5cd91062e50ed2cd4bcbcd

sys_element_mapping.value: You have been identified as the supervisor of an employee who has not accessed APi’s network in over 30 days. In order to be compliant with our SOX SEC05 Control you need to indicate if {{b029bf59-5c7c-4a14-8a55-69dd287b2e83.person_leaving.name}} is still an active employee requiring network access. Please select one of the four options below. This must be completed by {{b029bf59-5c7c-4a14-8a55-69dd287b2e83.due_date}}. If you do not respond by then the employee’s access will be terminated.

sys_variable_value.value: 90 day review or employee is SEC17 term reactivated

sys_hub_flow_logic.comment: Is it 90 day or 30 day review?

sys_element_mapping.value: You have been identified as the supervisor of an employee who has not accessed APi’s network in over 30 days. In order to be compliant with our SOX SEC05 Control you need to indicate if {{b029bf59-5c7c-4a14-8a55-69dd287b2e83.person_leaving.name}} is still an active employee requiring network access. Please select one of the four options below. This must be completed by {{b029bf59-5c7c-4a14-8a55-69dd287b2e83.due_date}}. If you do not respond by then the employee’s access will be terminated.

You have been identified as the supervisor of {{b029bf59-5c7c-4a14-8a55-69dd287b2e83.person_leaving.name}}, an employee who has not accessed APi’s network in over 30 days.

Employee last login date: {{b029bf59-5c7c-4a14-8a55-69dd287b2e83.last_login}}

Network Security and SOX Compliancy regulations require quarterly recertification of employment status for employees who do not access their active network accounts. Last certification for {{b029bf59-5c7c-4a14-8a55-69dd287b2e83.person_leaving.name}} was performed on {{ef042713-a605-4f08-992b-47abd7301d5e.output_last_response}}.

Please certify the employee’s status below. This must be completed by {{fd_transform:da414b82-5281-4d49-987b-1b23cf49c8d5}}.
